definition: common/general/to share/together/total/altogether/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3], Communist party
to shake/to flap/to vibrate/to resonate/to rise up with spirit/to rouse oneself

pinyin: gong1 neng2 xing4 ci2 gong4 zhen4 cheng2 xiang4
gong1 neng2 ci2 gong4 zhen4 cheng2 xiang4 shu4

sentences.english: And so she released him to be with those who resonated with his path.
sentences.chinese: 所以她放下了他，讓他和那些與他道路共振的人同行。

sentences.english: This paper analyzes the glyceryl polyether by nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR) spectroscopy.
sentences.chinese: 用核磁共振分析了甘油聚醚。

sentences.english: Extreme formant shifting is like 1/2 speed tape , but realtime.
sentences.chinese: 偏激的共振峯偏移像半速運行的磁帶，但是實時的。

sentences.english: The lack of exotic states tells against a picture of resonances as being composite.
sentences.chinese: 缺乏例外態也不支持共振態是複合的圖象。

sentences.english: The temperature measurement using neutron resonance spectrum has many advantages comparing traditional techniques of temperature measurement.
sentences.chinese: 中子共振測溫與傳統的測溫技術相比，具有很多優勢。

sentences.english: Functional magnetic resonance imaging of activity in the subjects' brains hints at a possible explanation.
sentences.chinese: 受試者的大腦活動的核磁共振成像暗示着一個解釋。

sentences.english: The structures of both are characterized by FT-TR and 1H-NMR.
sentences.chinese: 藉助紅外光譜和1H核磁共振譜圖分析了產物的結構。

sentences.english: Thermal grating was generated after resonant absorption of light by the dye.
sentences.chinese: 染料對泵浦光共振吸收後，在液晶中形成熱光柵。

sentences.english: The tone is significantly affected by the weight and mass distribution of the vibrating plates.
sentences.chinese: 共振調節器改變音板的重量也就影響到樂器的基音。

sentences.english: The 13C-NMR and 1H-NMR spectra were reported for the macrocyclic polyaryl-ester oligomer.
sentences.chinese: 本文報道了環狀聚芳酯低聚物的核磁共振碳譜及氫譜。

sentences.english: Stochastic resonance is studied in amplitude and frequency modulating processes.
sentences.chinese: 研究調幅和調頻過程中的隨機共振。

sentences.english: Small distributed capacitance and high resonance frequency.
sentences.chinese: 分佈電容小，自共振頻率高。

sentences.english: The most radical of the new approaches uses "quadrupole resonance technology".
sentences.chinese: 最引人注目的新方法是使用“四極矩共振技術”。

sentences.english: Results The structure of the target molecule was identified by 1H NMR, 13C NMR and element analysis.
sentences.chinese: 結果最終產物由核磁共振譜和元素分析進行結構鑑定。

sentences.english: And yet, according to the MRI, my libido is surprisingly strong.
sentences.chinese: 然而，根據核磁共振成像，我的性驅力出人意料的強。

sentences.english: Sodium atoms in flame can be resonantly excited by pulsed tunable dye laser.
sentences.chinese: 用脈衝可調諧染料激光共振激勵火焰中的鈉原子。

definition: to bounce/to bounce back/to boomerang/to ricochet/rebound (of stock market etc)/bounce/backlash/negative repercussions
(of trains) up (i.e. towards the capital)/(of river boats) to go against the current/to submit (a document) to higher authorities
to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
